hymn.title: Lord, You love me so immensely

layout.singingstanza: Lord, You love me so im -- mense -- ly; I would love You more in -- tense -- ly. Ev -- ery day and ev -- ery mo -- ment, O Lord, cap -- ture me. Let my goal and my life's theme be, Lord, to love You most su -- preme -- ly; With all my heart, Lord Je -- sus, Keep me faith -- ful un -- to Thee. Draw me, Lord, each day. Take my veils a -- way. With a pure heart will I see You; Lord I just love You. Noth -- ing else I seek; No one else for me. I would ful -- ly and ab -- so -- lute -- ly Give my whole be -- ing un -- to Thee.

lyrics.stanza: Lord, You love me so immensely; I would love You more intensely. Every day and every moment, O Lord, capture me. Let my goal and my life's theme be, Lord, to love You most supremely; With all my heart, Lord Jesus, Keep me faithful unto Thee.

Draw me, Lord, each day. Take my veils away. With a pure heart will I see You; Lord I just love You. Nothing else I seek; No one else for me. I would fully and absolutely Give my whole being unto Thee.
